outputSpeech.text: Mario's up special, Super Jump Punch, has 4 parts.  hit 1 is active frames 3 to 6 (Intangible: 3 to 6).  hits 2 to 4 are active frames 7, 8 and  9.  hits 5 to 6 are active frames 10 to 11 and  12 to 13.  hit 7 is active frames 14 to 15.  You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.
